DOC.HEADLINE: METROPOLITAN DIGEST / LOS ANGELES COUNTY NEWS IN BRIEF : COMPTON ; STORE OWNER SLAIN DURING ARGUMENT OVER PHONE USE
DOC.TEXT: The owner of a Compton discount_store was fatally wounded outside his business during an argument over the use of a pay phone , police said Friday . Ahmad Amer , 45 , of Anaheim was shot in the head and was dead on arrival at Martin_Luther_King Jr. / Drew Medical_Center , Compton Police Detective Michael Markey said . Amer came_out of the Ninety Five Cents Plus store at 810 W . Rosecrans Ave . and confronted people who had been using the phone and argued with them , Markey said . " A man standing with the people , but who we believe was not directly involved in the argument , shot the victim with a handgun , " he said .
